trans-unit.source: The exception that is thrown when [!INCLUDE[infocard](~/add/includes/infocard-md.md)] has not been started on the user's computer.
trans-unit.target: 時擲回的例外狀況[!INCLUDE[infocard](~/add/includes/infocard-md.md)]尚未啟動使用者的電腦上。

trans-unit.source: A ServiceNotStartedException exception is thrown when CardSpace has not been started on the user's computer.
trans-unit.target: 當 CardSpace 未在使用者電腦上啟動時，會擲回 ServiceNotStartedException 例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: If CardSpace has attempted to start but has been unable to for any reason, this exception is thrown.
trans-unit.target: 如果 CardSpace 嘗試啟動，但因故已經無法，會擲回這個例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: Check that the CardSpace service is installed and enabled on the computer.
trans-unit.target: 請檢查 CardSpace 服務已安裝，並在電腦上啟用。

trans-unit.source: Try to start the CardSpace service manually by using Microsoft Management Console (MMC).
trans-unit.target: 嘗試使用 Microsoft Management Console (MMC) 手動啟動 CardSpace 服務。

trans-unit.source: CardSpace version 1 does not support FAT file systems.
trans-unit.target: CardSpace 第 1 版不支援 FAT 檔案系統。

trans-unit.source: On FAT systems, CardSpace will not start and this exception will occur.
trans-unit.target: 在 FAT 系統上，CardSpace 將不會啟動，會發生此例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: Initializes an instance of the <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Selectors.ServiceNotStartedException"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的執行個體<xref href="System.IdentityModel.Selectors.ServiceNotStartedException"></xref>類別。

trans-unit.source: Initializes an instance of the <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Selectors.ServiceNotStartedException"></xref> class with the specified error message.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的執行個體<xref href="System.IdentityModel.Selectors.ServiceNotStartedException"></xref>類別指定的錯誤訊息。

trans-unit.source: The message that describes the error.
Initializes an instance of the <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Selectors.ServiceNotStartedException"></xref> class with serialized data.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的執行個體<xref href="System.IdentityModel.Selectors.ServiceNotStartedException"></xref>使用序列化資料的類別。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"></xref> object that contains the serialized object data about the exception that is being thrown.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"> </xref>物件，其中包含有關擲回的例外狀況的序列化的物件資料。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext> object that contains contextual information about the source or destination.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext>物件，其中包含關於來源或目的端內容資訊。</xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext>

trans-unit.source: Initializes an instance of the <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Selectors.ServiceNotStartedException"></xref> class with the specified error message and a reference to the inner exception that is the cause of this exception.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的執行個體<xref href="System.IdentityModel.Selectors.ServiceNotStartedException"></xref>類別指定的錯誤訊息以及造成此例外狀況的內部例外狀況的參考。

trans-unit.source: The message that describes the error.
The exception that is the cause of the current exception.
trans-unit.target: 造成目前例外狀況的例外狀況。
